How seasons work in GER
Jan - Cold

Mar – RainySnowColdness

July - HOT & BBQ
Aug – pls no more BBQ
Sept – Rain, Wiiiiind
Oct – Übergangsjacke
Nov - Dark, Rain, Soup
Dec – GLÜHWEIN
